name: Brad Silnutzer
bio:
Brad Silnutzer is a stand up, writer, producer, and host who was recently named one of Comedy Centralâ€™s 2016 Comics to Watch. Brad created, produces, and hosts Brew HaHa: The Comedy Show Drinking game. He has written for shows such as Penn and Teller" Fool Us for CW, Talent Overload for Verizon Go90, and The Hook Up for MTV.

As a young lad, Brad started his performing career as the Ovaltine boy saying such lines as, "More Ovaltine Please" and "Mom, why are you making me do this?". Now, he can be found wandering the streets on LA wondering why he left two promising careers to start doing comedy.
